description: Java entity class representing a User for authentication and role-based access control, including database table mappings, validation, and lifecycle callbacks.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class for user data encompassing authentication info, roles, and timestamps.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback to set creation and update timestamps before persisting.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback to update timestamp before updating the entity.
